solution_line_template: The original flock gains {ducks_born_per_year}-{ducks_killed_per_year}=<<{ducks_born_per_year}-{ducks_killed_per_year}={net_ducks_per_year}>>{net_ducks_per_year} ducks per year
So after {years} years they have gained {net_ducks_per_year}*{years}=<<{net_ducks_per_year}*{years}={total_ducks_gained}>>{total_ducks_gained} ducks
So the original flock has {original_flock_size}+{total_ducks_gained}=<<{original_flock_size}+{total_ducks_gained}={original_flock_after_years}>>{original_flock_after_years} ducks
So the combined flock has {original_flock_after_years}+{other_flock_size}=<<{original_flock_after_years}+{other_flock_size}={combined_flock}>>{combined_flock} ducks
